channel.title: Pick up glitch?
channel.description: If you kill a player, and their stuff appears, but you can't pick it up? I've modified my youdied() code to make it support protect 1 item but now when you kill a player their stuff you can't get?

item.title: Pick up glitch?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

If you kill a player, and their stuff appears, but you can’t pick it up? I’ve modified my youdied() code to make it support protect 1 item but now when you kill a player their stuff you can’t get?

Read full topic
